# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="503f5-102">Shranjevanje sporočil v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="503f5-103">E-poštnih sporočil ne morete shraniti v Outlook.com, lahko pa jih natisnete v datoteko PDF, ki jo lahko shranite v računalnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="503f5-104">Microsoft Print to Utility PDF, ki je vključen v sistem Windows 10, omogoča tiskanje poljubnega e-poštnega sporočila neposredno v datoteko PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="503f5-105">Izberite sporočilo, ki ga želite shraniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="503f5-106">Izberite tri pike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="503f5-107">na vrhu sporočila in nato izberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="503f5-108">**Natisni**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="503f5-109">Znova izberite **Natisni** , nato pa v spustnem meniju tiskalnik izberite **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="503f5-110">Izberite **Natisni**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="503f5-111">Vnesite ime datoteke in izberite **Shrani**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="503f5-112">**Opomba:** To ni priporočeno v skupni rabi ali v javnih računalnikih, saj lahko drugi uporabniki dostopajo do vseh datotek PDF, ki jih shranite v računalnik in jih ne izbrišete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="503f5-113">Če želite več informacij o tiskanju, glejte [tiskanje e-poštnih sporočil, prilog in koledarjev v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="503f5-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
